title: Crimson, Volume Two
description: Alex Elder's destiny is now! From Batman: Gotham by Gaslight's Brian Augustyn and Amazing Spider-Man's Humberto Ramos, return to the world of Crimson with the beloved final chapters to Alex Elder's ascension. Collecting issues 13-24, witness the conclusion to this visionary series with all the horror and fantasy imaginable. Presented for the first time ever in prestigious hardcover format, featuring a brand-new cover illustrated by Humberto Ramos.
author: Brian Augustyn
